header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Where to put belongings, holidays, routines/ chores, cinema, returning product, Oldham, camera battery, card reader, shops, directions, weather, illnesses, university.
header.activity: Father and daughter converse on the way to the shops

body.u: I don't have much stuff
I think the children must be breaking up from school
yeah
I just have the necessities it's just I don't know where to put it
maybe you need more cupboards
I've got no room I mean it's like stuff that I like need but I'm like I just like I couldn't throw it out but I don't know I just don't know how where to put it
have you not got an attic of a good size?
we've loads of stuff in the attic already
yeah it's half two already
yeah
what have you done today?
well it's my first day off so

were you not off erm

yeah
got my day off today
yeah

mm

wash my clothes and put bags away and stuff so I wanna plan for so get that done today and tomorrow could do with giving the place a bit of a clean have to get out and do some shopping get some food in so yeah I thought I'll have a look at what's on at the cinema in case you wanted to go out but I wou don't really have any money till I get paid next
yeah
after going on holiday I don't think there's much on at the minute anyway

I know if it's not working
maybe you you'll have to dunno cos it's been a while you've had it
no it's still
if you're gonna
I can still return it
oh right
I have about a week left
oh right so you don't really have to explain or anything to say it's not never worked since you got it?

well how do you know it's worked or not then?
cos you just
is there a button on it?
yeah
through the packet yeah?
yeah
oh right
you wouldn't be able to return it if you'd taken it out of the packaging I don't think
really?
yeah I don't know maybe I guess
yeah well if you took it out and it wasn't working
yeah
but like you say well it's not worked so
yeah I guess so
well sometimes they're a bit funny once it's been opened
yeah
I suppose cos it is a device that doesn't work I suppose they won't mind but yeah it is in its packaging so they can't say no

without the battery

no the battery is there's like the charge
oh no power?

yeah cos it's getting power from your computer
cos it it just wouldn't do any it just said no battery and it just went black

well I took the card out and put it in my card reader after the

yeah
and you plug it in and it
oh

so then you've plugged that machine in the
yeah

cos it co

right

mm mm

no I suppose I could do with getting some food but I've got some for tonight

who?

mm
so I'm not sure what causes it
you can't catch it can you?
no it's not contagious I wouldn't be bringing you if it was contagious I probably wouldn't be going myself

just ate a worm

and it's like go to the hospital and I'm like no
well yeah some of the stuff says you will die immediately and and
you symptoms
ridiculous the stuff you get online you're a a young healthy girl I dunno why you're looking at that stuff
oh so is that what I have to worry about when I'm old? I'm gonna be like what's wrong with me? I'll be at the doctor every week like I hope nothing's wrong with me
if you look after yourself there's no reason why you want to be worrying about when you're older either
yeah
so it's er you take care of yourself don't you?
but some things it's like yeah
well some things you just get
there's no explanation you can just get it and I'll be like like cos then like if there's something
well if you have a proper illness you'll know about it
you don't wanna go looking online for it
I mean
because

cos some stuff it's like oh to avoid getting this make sure you eat vegetables and I'm like okay I'll eat vegetables but there's some stuff is like you can't prevent this and I'll be like and then it's like is it what oh oh?

do do do TK Maxx
generally if you you shouldn't expect to be getting anything

you know try to rest yourself when you're tired and things

oh because that's
